sentences.sCn: 为消除通货膨胀所作的努力

sentences.sContent: This problem has now been completely eradicated.
sentences.sCn: 这个问题现已彻底杜绝。

remMethod.val: e (看作ex， 出) + radi (根) + c + ate (做…) → 把根拔出 → 根除

words.tran: 根除者；根除器；去污剂；墨水擦

trans.tranOther: to completely get rid of something such as a disease or a social problem
